snippet.title: Swift 3: Firebase Social Login - Facebook Authentication and Cocoapods
snippet.description:
Welcome to the Firebase Social Login series. In this first episode, we'll go through a short demo of our application. Next we'll dive straight into how to install Facebook's iOS SDK with Cocoapods. By the end of the video, you'll have learned how to integrate this solution to authenticate users through facebook.

Basic iOS Training Course:
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/basic-training

Step-by-step Tutorial and Completed Project Download:
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course_video?id=412

FB iOS SDK Getting Started guide:
https://developers.facebook.com/docs/ios/getting-started

Feel free to drop me a line on Twitter: https://twitter.com/buildthatapp
